T01D1174:251a-1: lo ke shva ra ratna m'a la sta bo n'a ma /
T01D1174:251a-3: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba /
T01D1174:251b-0: 'jig rten mgon @251b po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1174:251b-1: 'jig rten dbang phyug dri med thugs ni snying dang snying rjes brlan //
T01D1174:251b-2: lam mkhyen nyid dang thams cad mkhyen nyid la sogs
T01D1174:251b-3: don dang tshig / gsal bar 'doms shing yongs su
T01D1174:251b-4: rdzogs dang rnam par dag pa'i sku //
T01D1174:251b-5: ye shes lhag pa'i bdag pos rol par mgo bos phyag bgyi'o ;
T01D1174:251b-6: / gdul bya'i dbye ba'i dbang las gcig kyang du mar snang ba ni //
T01D1174:251b-7: chu snod rnams su gnas pa'i ri bong can dang mtshungs gang las //
T01D1174:251b-8: khyod ni gsal bar gzhan la phan pa'i rjes su song de'i phyir //
T01D1174:251b-9: ae ma'o rdzu 'phrul mchog tu rmad byung sku ni rigs pa lags //
T01D1174:251b-10: skye bo mu stegs pa rnams rab tu sad cing gdul don du //
T01D1174:251b-11: yongs rdzogs zla ba'i zhal ni rnam par sgeg pa'i dpral ba yi //
T01D1174:251b-12: gnas las lha sbas dbang phyug chen po nges phyung bas //
T01D1174:251b-13: lha yi shin tu lha dang chen po'i mi yi dbang phyug khyod //
T01D1174:251b-14: legs rgyas chen po'i mtshan mnga' khyod kyi phrag pa las //
T01D1174:251b-15: phyi rol dag tu phyung ba mes po lha yi bu nyid ni //
T01D1174:251b-16: pad+ma'i skye ba pa rnams gdul zhing rab tu sad phyir te //
T01D1174:251b-17: 'jig rten dbang phyug dbang phyug gtso la mgo bos phyag bgyi'o //
T01D1174:251b-18: khyab 'jug pa yi skye bo gdul zhing rtogs par bya ba'i phyir //
T01D1174:251b-19: srid sgrub dag kyang phyag na pad+ma 'dzin pa'i thugs ka las //
T01D1174:251b-20: nges par phyung 'di srid pa'i dbang phyug nyid de de'i slad du //
T01D1174:251b-21: mchog gi skyes bu khyod nyid lags te mchog gzhan yod ma yin //
T01D1174:251b-22: nyi zlar gus bcas stobs kyis bsnyen bkur rim gro brtsams rnams la //
T01D1174:251b-23: yang dag bstan phyir mthon mthing mdzes pa'i spyan ni gang dag las //
T01D1174:251b-24: ri bong can dang nyi ma nges phyung sa la mig rnams kyi //
T01D1174:251b-25: nang gi mun nag 'joms pa de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1174:251b-26: 'di na dpal mor rim gro bsnyen bkur sbyor ba po rnams ni //
T01D1174:251b-27: gdul dang nges par sad phyir bcom ldan dbyangs can
T01D1174:251b-28: ma 'di dag / rgyal ba'i sras po khyod kyi
T01D1174:251b-29: mche ba'i rtse las rab phyung bas //
T01D1174:251b-30: mngon 'dod shes rab 'bras bu ster ba de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1174:251b-31: rlung gi skye ba ba rnams gdul dang mi zad lam grub phyir //
T01D1174:251b-32: de nas 'jig rten mgon po'i zhal gang zhig las nges phyung 'di //
T01D1174:251b-33: rlung lha mchog gi bla ma sa la skye ba pa rnams kyi //
T01D1174:252a-0: spyod lam rnam bzhi'i 'bras bu ster ba de la @252a * //
T01D1174:252a-2: chu lha pa rnams gdul dang zhi pa'i lam 'dod ldan rnams kyi //
T01D1174:252a-3: yang dag khong du chud phyir bde gshegs sras po'i lto ba las //
T01D1174:252a-4: yang dag phyung ba chu lha'i gtso bo yang ste myur ba ru //
T01D1174:252a-5: 'dod dgu'i dbang phyug nyid kyi 'bras bu ster la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1174:252a-6: mthun pa'i 'bras bu la sogs mngon par 'dod rnams nges gdul zhing //
T01D1174:252a-7: yang dag grub phyir rab mchog mtshan ldan zhabs kyi pad+ma las //
T01D1174:252a-8: gang zhig nges par phyung ba bcom ldan nor 'dzin mar grags pa //
T01D1174:252a-9: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po mnyam med de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1174:252a-10: khyod ni srid las grol kyang de la yang dag gnas pa ni //
T01D1174:252a-11: sems can tshogs la snying brtse nyid las srid pa'i spyod tshul gyis //
T01D1174:252a-12: srid mtha'i bar du brtan pa bdag ni rtag gnas gyur snyam du //
T01D1174:252a-13: dam pa'i bsam pa chen po'i mchog gyur khyod la phyag bgyi'o //
T01D1174:252a-14: nam mkha'i bar du snang ba'i 'jig rten khams rnams khyod nyid kyis //
T01D1174:252a-15: rang gi zhabs gcig mthil gyis kyang ni rnam par gnon pa ste //
T01D1174:252a-16: bskal pa'i mtha' ru srid pa sred par 'bar ba drag po'i me //
T01D1174:252a-17: khyod kyi dbugs kyi rlung gi stobs kyis nges par bcil bar gyur //
T01D1174:252a-18: rang gi mdzub mo gyen du gtod de 'dzin pa'i sdigs mdzub kyis //
T01D1174:252a-19: lhun po'i tshigs rnams du ma g-yo bar gyur cing sen mo yi //
T01D1174:252a-20: sbubs kyis gyen du 'dzin pas rgya mtsho'i chu yang lus ma gyur //
T01D1174:252a-21: ae ma'o 'di lta'i nus pa khyod las gzhan du ci zhig mthong //
T01D1174:252a-22: mchog tu gnyen gshin zla ba gzhon nu'i mdzes pa yang dag par //
T01D1174:252a-23: ston pa'i sku mchog 'di yang lang tsho ma yi yin nam ci //
T01D1174:252a-24: 'jigs byed drag po gnon las mi ldongs ci yang dub pa dang //
T01D1174:252a-25: gdul dka' ba yi bdud 'joms pa ni khyod kyi spyod tshul lags //
T01D1174:252a-26: kye lags 'di ltar chen po'i skye bo'i ril phreng dang mtshungs par //
T01D1174:252a-27: rang gi dbu skyes mchog tu mdzes pa'i lan bu 'khyog po de //
T01D1174:252a-28: de nyid me yis nyon mongs bud shing sbar bar byas pa yi //
T01D1174:252a-29: du ba'i phreng ba lta bu dri med khyod la snang bar gyur //
T01D1174:252a-30: zla zer cung zad 'phros pa yis ni cung zad khyab khyod kyis //
T01D1174:252a-31: nag po'i phyogs zad chung ngu'i cha bcas 'od kyi mdzes pa ni //
T01D1174:252b-0: srid pa @252b rnams su 'dod pa gang gyur ri bong can gang de //
T01D1174:252b-1: khyod zer cung zad las ni ma lus bsam pa rnam par mdzes //
T01D1174:252b-2: mthun par 'gros pa'i ngan pa'i lam can lugs 'joms shing //
T01D1174:252b-3: mi dang mi min bsam pa ston la lam dang lam //
T01D1174:252b-4: yang dag thob byed gzhan don spyod tshul mchog gis na //
T01D1174:252b-5: mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag bgyi'o //
T01D1174:252b-6: khyod ni srid dang mya ngan 'das la mi gnas kyang //
T01D1174:252b-7: 'od gsal rang byin brlab sbyor la zhugs phan pa ni //
T01D1174:252b-8: ma lus skye bo'i mi dge zhi mdzad dge ba yi //
T01D1174:252b-9: mdzes pa'i sa yi dbang phyug rgyal la phyag bgyi'o //
T01D1174:252b-10: rigs kyi 'od zer dpag med phreng bas yang dag dkrigs //
T01D1174:252b-11: rang gi phyag gi chu skyes 'dzin pa las skyes pa de //
T01D1174:252b-12: dga' ba rjes mthun thob pa yang dag dga' bde yis //
T01D1174:252b-13: mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal //
T01D1174:252b-14: chos kyi dbyings las kun mchog snying rje rang nyid gtso //
T01D1174:252b-15: gang zhig dge ba la sogs tshogs rnams yang dag rdzogs //
T01D1174:252b-16: rnam par rtog spangs mthu las sgra yi ston pa po //
T01D1174:252b-17: mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag bgyi'o //
T01D1174:252b-18: de bzhin nyid dang nyid min gnyis med bde ba brgyas //
T01D1174:252b-19: yongs su gang bar mdzad pa brgya phrag chos kyi gtam //
T01D1174:252b-20: shin tu bden zhing rigs par gsung bas rnam mdzes pa //
T01D1174:252b-21: 'dzin ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po mchog la phyag bgyi'o //
T01D1174:252b-22: mchog de'i rang gi sku ni 'gro la rab 'phro ba //
T01D1174:252b-23: mtsho skyes spyan gyis shin tu mdzes par gyur pa yi //
T01D1174:252b-24: ma lus sems can rnams kyi myur ba'i thar mchog
T01D1174:252b-25: gi / rgyal po 'dzin ma'i dbang phyug dam par
T01D1174:252b-26: bdag phyag 'tshal // mchog tu sprul dang longs spyod rdzogs pa gzhan don dgyes //
T01D1174:252b-27: stong nyid gos med chos 'dzin pa la dgyes pa can //
T01D1174:252b-28: rnam byang chub las dngos grub dam pa 'dzin dbang po //
T01D1174:252b-29: 'dzin ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T01D1174:252b-30: mchog tu lhan skyes dam pa'i rgya mtshor zla zhal gyi //
T01D1174:252b-31: sgo las thams cad gsung ba ma lus ngag tshig ni //
T01D1174:252b-32: mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rjes mthun rgyan gyi phul //
T01D1174:252b-33: dbang phyug 'dzin ma'i rgyal po dam par phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1174:252b-34: 'jig rten dbang phyug bstod pa rin po che yi phreng ba ni //
T01D1174:253a-1: chen zhabs kyis bgyis pa las //
T01D1174:253a-2: de yis gtsang ma'i dge ba gang zhig thob gyur pa //
T01D1174:253a-3: de nyid kyis ni 'jig rten kun du bzang por gyur //
T01D1174:253a-4: bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba 'di ni rdzogs so /
T01D1174:253a-6: // / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta chen po
T01D1174:253a-7: nags kyi rin po che'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o
T01D1174:253a-8: // mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan sngar
T01D1174:253a-9: dge slong rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya bas bal yul
T01D1174:253a-10: ye rang gi grong khyer chen po'i 'dab dpal go
